mapper.select: select b.post_no as postNo, p.post_title as postTitle,p.post_progress as postProgress, m.member_picture as writerImg, m.member_name as postWriter, p.post_date as postDate,pr.pro_title as proName from bookmark b left join post p on b.post_no = p.post_no join member m on m.member_no = p.post_writer join project pr on pr.pro_no = p.post_pro_no where b.member_no=#{memberNo} order by p.post_date desc

select p.post_no as postNo, m.member_name as myName, p.post_title as postTitle, m.member_picture as myImg, p.post_date as postDate, pr.pro_title as proName from post p left join member m on p.post_writer=m.member_no left join project pr on p.post_pro_no=pr.pro_no where post_writer=#{memberNo}
